Name: CRAYON SHINCHAN The Storm Called! FLAMING KASUKABE RUNNER!!
About the game: ・Simple and fun action-packed runner game! An exhilarating runner game featuring everyone's favorite 'Crayon Shin-chan'! Jump past obstacles, collecting sweets and 'golden balls' along the way. Easy-to-use controls mean anyone can jump right in! ・Full of Shin-chan's costumes and reliable crew! Use the 'golden balls' and 'medals' earned in-game to collect Shin-chan's costumes from the animated series and movies along with picking up crew along the way. ・Hone your skills and continue challenging! Not stopping at just clearing a stage, you can continue having fun by aiming for the high score and completing goals, obtaining all the costumes, and gathering the entire crew.
